fields.name: Basic
value<text>: • Nun will randomly select a friendly unit within the shooting range (8) as the target.
• If no friendly unit is within range, Nun will target the closest friendly unit.
• The target unit must be within Nun's shooting range (8) for the healing to take effect.
• At the start of battle, Nun will not target Ghost Assassins, Magic Apprentice, Demon, or Shadow Ninja.
• At the start of battle, Nun may target Orc Hunters.
• The target unit will receives healing.

fields.name: Skill: Healing Light
value<text>: • When releasing skill, Nun will randomly select a friendly unit within the shooting range (8) as the new target.
• If no friendly unit is within range, Nun will select the closest friendly unit.
• The target unit must be within Nun's shooting range (8) for the skill to take effect.
• With the target unit as the center, all friendly units within the skill range (2) will receives healing.
• With the target unit as the center, all friendly units within the skill range (2) will receives control removal.
• Removable control include stun, binding, and freezing.

fields.name: Usage tips
value<text>: • Avoid placing Nun close to other fast-moving units
• Commonly used in Aly, Davison, Jinn, and Selene formation
• Commonly used in formation against Cerberus
